name: Content Marketing Campaign Creation
description: End-to-end workflow for planning, creating, and optimizing a comprehensive content marketing campaign

nodes.title: Campaign Planning
nodes.description: Define campaign objectives, target audience, key messages, and success metrics. Create a detailed campaign strategy and timeline.

nodes.title: Audience Research
nodes.description: Research target audience demographics, interests, pain points, and content consumption habits. Identify the best channels and content formats.

nodes.title: Competitor Content Analysis
nodes.description: Analyze competitors' content strategies, identify content gaps, and discover opportunities for differentiation and improvement.

nodes.title: Content Strategy Development
nodes.description: Develop a comprehensive content strategy based on research findings. Define content pillars, themes, and distribution channels.

nodes.title: Blog Content Creation
nodes.description: Create engaging blog posts, articles, and long-form content based on the content strategy. Focus on SEO optimization and audience engagement.

nodes.title: Social Media Content
nodes.description: Create social media posts, captions, and short-form content for various platforms. Adapt tone and format for each social channel.

nodes.title: Email Marketing Content
nodes.description: Create email newsletter content, promotional emails, and nurture sequences that align with the overall campaign strategy.

nodes.title: Content Quality Review
nodes.description: Review all created content for quality, brand consistency, message alignment, and effectiveness. Provide feedback and improvement suggestions.
